CheckTitle: Ensure image tag is set to Fixed â€“ not Latest or Blank
Description: Ensure container images use fixed tags (not 'latest' or blank) or are referenced by digest.
Risk: Using floating image tags can make deployments non-reproducible and introduce unexpected changes or vulnerabilities.

Recommendation.Text: Use explicit image tags or digests instead of 'latest' or leaving tags blank.

Notes: Image digests (sha256) are recommended for immutability.
